Posts.Content: My mum had two lumpectomies back in 2014 plus 11 lemphnodes removed where 4 were involved then after that had her 6 chemo plus 25 rads   Everything went smooth after that until few days ago. She went for routein checkup they suspected cancer in the Same breast where she had lumpectomy but no lumps this time. She had full mestactomy but needed no chemo and radio this time.she was on armidex for past 3 years. Oncologist decided hormone therapy as she had her harmonies positive but unfortunately this time her ER,PR changed into negative so Shebaz don't have any options but to wait and watch.has anybody else had a smiliar case or any idea what she can do in the mean while she is well scared thanks a lot in advance everyone xxx
